original_text: So do not be afraid of these people. They hide the things that they do. But there will be a time when other people will see those things. Everyone will know all their secrets.
korean_text: 그런즉 그들을 두려워하지 말라 감추인 것이 드러나지 않을 것이 없고 숨은 것이 알려지지 않을 것이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: So do not be afraid of these people
They hide the things that they do
But there will be a time
when other people will see those things
Everyone will know all their secrets
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그들의 모든 비밀을 알게 될 것이다
